title: Frequent disconnects and lag
body: I am Experiencing frequent lag spikes and disconnects

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me,

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

Switched to a public DNS (well, it was already done actually).

Got my WinMTR Results [here](http://pastebin.com/XHnriCgR)

Was unable to run Netalzyr, it doesnt appear to have a start link for me.
[Screenshot of problem.](http://i.imgur.com/504VeSI.png)
Java is enabled and ive tried reinstalling Java and also tried in a different browser.

Hey there,

For the Netalyzr test could you please try utilising their [Commandline Client](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/cli.html) for me, let me know if you're able to run this without issue.
